title: Two constructions of quaternary Legendre pairs of even length
abstract:
We give the first general constructions of even length quaternary Legendre
pairs: there is a quaternary Legendre pair of length $(q-1)/2$ for every prime
power $q$ congruent to $1$ modulo $4$, and there is a quaternary Legendre pair
of length $2p$ for every odd prime $p$ for which $2p-1$ is a prime power.
